title: Virgin Islands National Park: Lodging
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Lodging              Lodging         Lodging  Below is just a short list of what is available on St. John. There are even more options on St. Thomas, a short ferry ride away. I simple Internet search will provide you with unlimited options.  Caneel Bay Resort is located within the boundaries of the park. Westin St. John Resort. Gallows Point Grande Bay Resort  Inn At Tamarind Court Villas, There are  many vacation rental villas available across the island. They can be found on the many web sites that provide villa rental services.   Villas for the Park, just launched by Friends of the Park, offers the chance to enjoy the best of St. John while contributing to the Park.  Camping Offering "Camping in Paradise," Cinnamon Bay Campground located within the Park on a breathtaking beach. Restaurant and mini store on site. Concordia eco-resort offers eco-tents, studios, cabanas and other units. Concordia is located on the southwest side of the island.
